details.detail: 1 ,onion (finely chopped) 2 cloves, garlic (finely minced) 1 tbsp, turmeric (ground) 1/2 lb.,yellow split peas or lentils 6 oz.,baby spinach leaves (finely chopped) 12 C., water 1 C., fresh mint (finely chopped) 2 Tbsp.,flour or rice flour 2 Tbsp.,lemon juice ,olive oil ,Sea salt and freshly ground pepper

<p><span>(make meatballs)</span></p> <p><span>Add the onion and garlic to the same saucepan and saut&eacute; until golden. Add the turmeric, split peas and water and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 20 minutes.</span><br /><br /><span>Carefully add the meatballs and spinach to the saucepan. Mix the plain flour with a cup cold water to make a smooth paste, and then slowly add it to the soup, stirring all the time to prevent it from going lumpy.</span><br /><br /><span>Stir in the lemon juice, season with salt and pepper and cook over a gentle heat for 20 minutes. Remove the soup from the heat and garnish with a little chopped fresh mint and serve immediately.</span></p>
